chart_description: This chart shows the target cache memory utilization of the Netdata open database engine, which is a key-value store that stores performance metrics. The chart indicates whether the target memory is being fully utilized or not.

dimension_descriptions.current: Amount of memory currently in use by the cache.
dimension_descriptions.dirty max: Maximum amount of dirty memory that the cache can have.
dimension_descriptions.hot: Amount of memory in the cache that is used recently or frequently.
dimension_descriptions.hot max: Maximum amount of hot memory that the cache can have.
dimension_descriptions.wanted: Amount of memory that the cache wants to keep open.
